pr_title: grpclb: clean up usage of raw load balancing config attributes in tests

timeline.message: Clean up usages of raw load balancing config in Grpclb's tests.

timeline.bodyText: this won't be useful for non test purpose. can you move it to test class?
timeline.author: creamsoup

replies.bodyText: Ok, I thought would be good to have factory method that creates a GrpclbConfig with default mode (round_robin). Removed then.
replies.author: voidzcy

timeline.message: Removed method for creating GrpclbConfig with default mode.
